website_summaries.verdict: Customers needing a grand gesture should check out this massive teddy coming out to 6 and a half feet.
pros: One of the larger teddy bears available for purchase
Easy to clean despite white materials
cons: Heavier than many customer expected at 18 lbs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Of all the things I've bought for my wife over 24 years of marriage, she loves this the most!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it. Got it for my husband as a ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it. Got it for my husband as a christmas present. It's HUGE! and totally fluffy and adorable. Our friend was so jealous he went and got the same one for his girlfriend. (Didn't save their relationship, but was still a great gift)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big and soft
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bear for my daughter for valentine's day she loves him. He's huge and so soft. He looks like someone in a bear suit. He's a little on the heavy side but we love him.
customer_reviews.author: Char36

customer_reviews.title: This thing is huge and awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our daughter before she was born. We have used it every single month to take a photo of her with it to show how she grows. It sits in her bedroom and she is beginning to crawl all over and play with it when she can. The bear is huge and I expect it will hold up well for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Ian A

customer_reviews.title: Perfection Incarnate
customer_reviews.text: He's bigger than you'd think. His majestic legs fill your heart with a sense of fear and awe. Don't listen to the reviews saying he looks ugly. He is a god, and he is perfection incarnate. The perfect gift for any memer with a soft heart. I almost wish I'd bought him for myself. In conclusion, get this bear. He's big. He's soft. He'll wrap his loving legs around you and give you anything you ever wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Ted is big
customer_reviews.text: It is very big and the legs are extremely long... The stuffing tends to shift from the seems to the end of the legs. Its hard to stand up bc its top heavy but makes a perfect cuddle buddy its as long as my king size bed and it works as a sofa whrn sitting in bed lol great gift and it been thrown around during break ups and still standing strong. We named him Tedd
customer_reviews.author: XZellenZ

customer_reviews.title: One of the best gifts! Thank you guys!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 7 yr old daughter in Michigan. I spent days researching all the giant bears on amazon. This bear is the best bargain for the heaght and quality. It came vaccum packed. I was a little nervous that it wouldn't fluff out all the way. It exceeded my expectations, its so heavy she can't even move it by herself. It fluffed out better then I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Best Snuggler Ever
customer_reviews.text: Holy s***. I got this for my best friend for Valentine's Day and she loves it. It's about as big as a twin size bed and super soft. She sleeps on it and it's one of the best things to snuggle. The legs are super long lmao
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This bear is HUGE and HEAVY
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t be more happier with my life size bear, if you have a small bed you’ll need a good place to put the bear when you sleep, other then that it’s a perfect gift, and accessory to your bed.
customer_reviews.author: SweetS27

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter absolutely loves it. She sleeps with it every night. She is 10 and she carries the bear where every she wants. It is great.
customer_reviews.author: Dickybird

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Very cute daughter has had this for year and a half and it still is just like new
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Freakin' Huge Teddy!
customer_reviews.text: Man this bear is big! I am 6'1" and I am dwarfed by the thing. Box was bulging at the seems and was held together by plastic strips. Bear is very soft, and the seams are strong enough for it to be picked up by the head or arm without tear. I would not extensively test its strength, this is more for cuddling then for swinging it around. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: David Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Huge
customer_reviews.text: This bear is really huge! Although the legs look a little bit too long, has a nice finish and soft touch.
customer_reviews.author: Landers

customer_reviews.title: It's fluffy and soft and my granddaughter named him Bob ...
customer_reviews.text: It's fluffy and soft and my granddaughter named him Bob. Which stands for Big Ol Bear. But she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Larry Hall

customer_reviews.title: Odd head shape and flopped ear but a good giant teddy option nonetheless
customer_reviews.text: Got this for Valentines Day, it is mostly a good product but the head was stuffed strangely making the shape odd, and the right ear flopped back and can't stand straight or forward. It was as big as I'd hoped though and the rest of the body was fine.
customer_reviews.author: trey potier

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the appearance and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my granddaughter for Christmas and she was thrilled. Very proportional body and legs - had read some reviews saying that legs seemed overly long vs the body but we did not see this. Would definitely recommend this bear.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy J

customer_reviews.title: Short upper body long legs !
customer_reviews.text: The bear is great but it has one issue that the legs are way long they don’t the upper body is small
customer_reviews.author: Mahmoud

customer_reviews.title: Good value but quality is still up for debate
customer_reviews.text: Good value but the smile on the bear fell off pretty much as soon as I took it out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Iqbal

customer_reviews.title: Good material
customer_reviews.text: The material is smooth. I am 5'7 and I use the bear as a couch:))
customer_reviews.author: Ngay Vong

customer_reviews.title: All legs
customer_reviews.text: All of the pictures are taken at angles so you can't see that the bear is all legs. It's dispurportional and creepy. I feel decieved by the pictures. Considering returning.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best gift for my. 4'11"" little sister. Defiantly worth every penney
customer_reviews.author: Henry Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing much to say but everything was fine.
customer_reviews.text: So, I ordered a white 6 feet teddy-bear. When the package arrived and the company send me a wrong color teddy-bear. So, I decide to roll with it. When the day come, she love the teddy bear. I am happy to see her reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Escalante

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this within 2 days of ordering it and its the SOFTEST and FLUFFIEST material! The only regret I have is buying it as a christmas present and not for myself. 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: Best present ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best part of my teenaged daughter's Christmas. She was surprised and almost in tears to find this enormous bear waiting for her Christmas morning. She hasn't stopped laying on his lap and it's been several weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bingham

customer_reviews.title: I did not like it! Legs Are bigger than the body
customer_reviews.text: I did not like it ! Legs Are bigger than the body, IDK is just not what I was expected ...

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift. Its really big and soft. Its like plush chair. Nice and relaxing to hug up to.

customer_reviews.title: JUST AS ADVERTISED!!
customer_reviews.text: Bigger and better in everyway. I love this bear. He is huge! Thanks for the great transaction.

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mother's birthday, She Loves It! Great Gift.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding! Well packed in vacuum sealed bag inside box. Soft, fluffy and wonderful. Super speedy delivery!

customer_reviews.title: Nieces LOVED it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my twin nieces after my sister-in-law told my brother he couldn't get it, and they have been curling up in its lap with books and toys, climbing all over it, and generally loving it. 2 nieces give it a combined 20/20
customer_reviews.author: Erik Gieszelmann

customer_reviews.title: Great Selection
customer_reviews.text: I bought my girl friend this bear for Valentine's day and she loved it! The bear is the same height as her (6'3") and she said that it was heavy as well. Mission accomplished. 😎

customer_reviews.title: This Bear saved my marriage
customer_reviews.text: This bear lasted my whole deployment overseas without this bear I would probably be divorced by now.

customer_reviews.title: Girlfriends love it.
customer_reviews.text: Girlfriend loved this giant teddy, and personally I enjoyed driving around with it in my car. The bear showed up with multiple tears in the head, and is it a bit awkward looking at first.

customer_reviews.title: The bear is great but the fabric on the bow tie is already ...
customer_reviews.text: The bear is great but the fabric on the bow tie is already starting to unravel. A more sturdy fabric which doesn't frizz at the seams should have been used. Otherwise, no complaints - my daughter absolutely loves it!

Would recommend this item to anyone looking to purchase this kind of an item.

customer_reviews.text: The company is amazing to order from they will go out of there way to make sure that you are happy with your order. My 8 year old was so excited with this beat for Christmas she really loved it!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bear for the money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bear for the money. Yes the legs are too long. My 25 year old lady friend LOVED HIM as soon as she opened the box. She has about 50 bears and this is her biggest by far. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: talon1189

customer_reviews.title: Where am I supposed to sleep now?
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife on Valentines Day. Guys, I know it seems expensive, but believe me; you won't be sorry for this purchase! This thing is huge, soft, and very loveable. Almost too much so.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: I love him but his legs are too long
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy unless you have a huge bed and very large rooms. This guy is gigantic and takes up over half of a queen bed. I love him but his legs are too long. I should have gotten the 4' bear. Even my living room is not big enough to set him on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable Con: Constant sewing
customer_reviews.text: Pro: can be used as a bed. Very comfortable Con: Constant sewing. I had to sew it over 5 times already because seems keep breaking.

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and huggable

customer_reviews.title: and comfortable. Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Big, fluffy, and comfortable. Great gift idea. Bought this for my Girlfriend as a Christmas gift 2 years ago we still have it at basically 100% sits on our bed with us great for sitting up against it or for using a leg as a pillow. 100% would buy again if i had to.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This teddy bear really is 78 inches tall. There were no sewing defects and the overall quality was great. Overall this is a high quality product and would be a great gift. (The bear is kind of smashed into the box to make it fit so I recommend working the stuffing around before giving as a gift.)

customer_reviews.title: Alastair the teddy bear
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my teddy bear! He's perfect! He hasn't moved much since I got him he's just seated by my bed but I love him. I have noticed a couple seams coming undone around the leg and belly area but he is still perfect. I named him Alastair!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my 5 year-old niece, I am so pleased with this product. The Teddy Bear is huge! The stitching is perfect. The stuffing is firm and fluffy. The coat is so plush! I highly recommend this product! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Kippley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome teddy bear for our stuffed animal nut!
customer_reviews.text: For Christmas, our 3 yr old daughter was adamant that she wanted Santa to bring her "the biggest teddy bear in the world" and this fit the bill. She LOVES it! It sits on her floor and she uses it primarily to lean up against when she reads books. It's super soft and well put together. Comes packed tightly in a small box but once you open it, it expands to full size in short order. The legs are a bit long and out of proportion to what you'd expect w/ a teddy bear but she doesn't care and just loves it! Great product and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: decent bear for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant at first to buy this knowing there is only 30ish reviews but I took a chance, and it was comepletly worth every dime. This bear is fantastic for all occasions, mine is for valentines day, which is an amazing gift to surprise your loved ones with. This bear is a pretty decent quality, material is soft, but thin. It arrived early and was easy to unpack, no holes, dirt etc. The legs are unproportional to the upper body, way to long, but it is not that big of a deal; quite frankly the only design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Owen H.

customer_reviews.title: ... is still well made and made Valentine's day even better.
customer_reviews.text: legs make up a considerable amount of the impressive height but it is still well made and made Valentine's day even better.

customer_reviews.title: But my girl loved so its
customer_reviews.text: The bear isn't any where to close 6'5. But my girl loved so its great
customer_reviews.author: Christopher best

customer_reviews.title: Soft bear but not great.
customer_reviews.text: The bear itself was soft and packed full of filling. However, the legs seem to be way too long for the body. Also, I specifically asked the customer service if the box that it ships in would have any indication of what is inside as it was going to be a present for someone living with me. They answered no which turned out to be incorrect.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: the long legged teddy
customer_reviews.text: legit 78" teddy, but probably 50 of the 78 inches are in the legs.. the bear has super long legs. if that doesn't bother you then its a great bear, but it looks kind of awkward to me, more like a human than teddy bear. i thought teddys were big with short little arms and legs..

product_meta.title: Joyfay Giant Teddy Bear, White- Over 6ft (78”) Teddy Bear in Bold White with Velvety Plush Velour. Christmas Bear
feature_bullets: GIANT CUDDLER- While huge in stature, this giant teddy has an even bigger personality; This bear is a truly gargantuan 78” (Over 6ft); Your little one will be speechless when they find this stuffed beauty on that special day

CERTIFIABLY SAFE- This big Teddy Bear has been certified by the Pennsylvania Bureau of Occupational and Industrial Safety; After rigorous testing, all of the stuffed toys made by Joyfay have been found to be safe, chemically and physically, for people of all ages

QUALITY CRAFTSMANSHIP- With a sparkling white coat made of a silken velour and a durable polyester cotton filling, this big stuffed animal is made to last; All of the fabric and material used in the construction of this bear are original and not recycled; This helps to assure your bear is special and free of any harmful chemicals

CONVENIENT SHIPPING- We have multiple warehouses in the United States to help get your bear out as quickly as possible; There are also a variety of shipping options, including expedited and premium, so you can get your Teddy Bear when you need it
LOVE ME FOR SURE GUARANTEE- If you have any issues at all, simply contact one of our dedicated customer service staff and they will help to resolve any problems

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars295 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
